description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows USB Video Class system driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43643), Microsoft has released several updates that need to be applied based on your operating system version:

1. Identify your system version and corresponding build number.
2. Download and apply the relevant update package from the official Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2, apply KB5046617: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5046633: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2, apply KB5046633: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
   - For Windows 10 x64-based Systems, apply KB5046665: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046665)
   - For Windows 10 32-bit Systems, apply KB5046665: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046665)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5046613: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2, apply KB5046613: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613)

**Details**:
This update mitigates an elevation of privilege vulnerability that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code and gain elevated access rights. Ensure that you restart your system after installation to apply the changes effectively.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you know your Windows version and build number before downloading and applying updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with any updates.
